about.title: About me
about.content:
Hello, I'm Henrique Martins Costa, a passionate Full-Stack developer with over 3 years of experience, working mainly with Laravel, PostgreSQL, Flutter, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

I'm studying Software Engineering at the Federal University of GoiÃ¡s (UFG), and I'm dedicated to building efficient and scalable solutions, always aiming for code quality and maintainability.

My professional journey includes creating robust web systems and cross-platform mobile applications, as well as leading and collaborating with teams to deliver projects that exceed expectations.

I am always looking for new knowledge and challenges, and I strongly believe in the power of teamwork for project success.
